trial.Description: Image presentation number during study block

pres.Description: Running count of stimulus presentations for a particular image

ts_blk.Description: The test block that the image was subsequently presented in

ts_trl.Description: The test trial number within a test block that the image was subsequently presented in

task.Description: The type of task the image was subsequently tested on

crit.Description: The criterion condition the image was subsequently tested on

disc.Description: The discriminability condition the image was subsequently tested on

mem_disc.LongName: Discriminability condition wrt the recognition memory task
mem_disc.Description: The relative discriminability level wrt the recognition memory regardless of task type

Levels.low: Low discriminability condition where studied images appeared once during the study phase
Levels.mod: Moderate discriminability condition where studied images appeared six times during the study phase

per_disc.LongName: Discriminability condition wrt the visual detection task
per_disc.Description: The relative discriminability level wrt the visual detection regardless of task type

Levels.low: Low discriminability condition where it was relatively difficult to find a person in the person-present images
Levels.mod: Moderate discriminability condition where it was relatively easy to find a person in the person-present images

per_type.LongName: The type of trial wrt the visual detection task
per_type.Description: The target status of each test image wrt the visual detection task regardless of task type

Levels.nt: Nontarget item that did not include a person in the image
Levels.tg: Target item that included a person in the image

accuracy.Description: The subsequent response accuracy for a stimulus
